name: City Zombie Madness
description:
Countless groups of the walking dead are once again encroaching on humanity. They strive to get to every city where people are still trying to survive. And your task is to counter the threat.
Install defensive towers along the perimeter of the zombies. Start with a small budget and build your first tower. With the destruction of enemies, you will receive money that you can use to build additional towers or improve existing ones. The towers differ in their range and type of damage (shells, rockets, electric pulse, fire), but they all deal well with carrion.

Zombies appear in waves and with each wave they move faster and have greater survivability.
Enemies move along a given trajectory, which allows you to tactically plan your defense.
And remember that you can miss a limited number of zombies, but preferably none.

City Zombie Madness is a tower defense game in a post-apocalypse military zombie setting.



- Hordes of the walking dead
- Real-time tactics
- Lots of shooting
